remarks: Properties of a restricted definite description operator.  Todo ( ~ df-riota update): can some uses of ~ riota2f be shortened with this?  (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2013.)
statement:
riotaprop.0 $e |- F/ x ps $.
riotaprop.1 $e |- B = ( iota_ x e. A ph ) $.
riotaprop.2 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
riotaprop $p |- ( E! x e. A ph -> ( B e. A /\ ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
